attributes.action: enact legislation to correct excessive compensation and pension arrangements for executives of bailed out companies
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Many Banks have been forced to rely on state funding to bail out bad business decisions. One example is RBS whose bailout will cost 1p on income tax for every tax payer for the next decade.
By taking excessive risks, a few company execs have been able to feather their nests at massive global economic cost.
In these exceptional times, we ask the PM to take exceptional measures and enact retrospective and targeted legislation to correct those excesses. 
This would include the removal of pension schemes above and beyond state mandated levels.
